title: Windy City Time Machine
subTitle: 風城時光機：舊城古蹟與市場文藝復興
intro: Explore the oldest developed area in Northern Taiwan. From the Qing Dynasty East Gate to the revitalized Dongmen Market.

spots.name: Hsinchu Train Station (新竹火車站)
spots.description: Admire the Baroque architecture of Taiwan's oldest surviving train station and walk along the moat park.

spots.name: City God Temple (城隍廟)
spots.description: The highest-ranking City God Temple in Taiwan. Try the famous Red Yeast Meatball and Spring Roll at the temple square.

spots.name: Dongmen Market (東門市場)
spots.description: An old market turned hipster hub. Enjoy creative cuisine like 'Gout Vermicelli' and visit hidden bars at night.

title: Hakka Tea Gold Era
subTitle: 客家茶金歲月：北埔老街與擂茶體驗
intro: Travel back to the Gold Tea Era in Beipu. Visit the filming location of 'Gold Leaf' and experience traditional Lei Cha DIY.
transportation: **Taiwan Tourist Shuttle (Lion's Head Mountain Line)** from HSR Hsinchu Station.

spots.name: Chiang A-Hsin Mansion (姜阿新洋樓)
spots.description: A baroque-style mansion witnessing the glorious tea export history. Pre-booking for guided tours is recommended.

spots.name: Lei Cha DIY (擂茶體驗)
spots.description: Grind tea leaves, peanuts, and sesame seeds with a guava tree pestle. A hands-on experience of Hakka hospitality.

spots.name: Green World Ecological Farm (綠世界生態農場)
spots.description: Optional: A great place for families to see alpacas and tropical rainforest plants.

title: Mountain & Sea Duet
subTitle: 山海雙響炮：尖石天空步道與南寮夕陽
intro: From the glass skywalk in the indigenous mountains to the fish scale stairway by the sea. A perfect weekend getaway.

spots.name: Frog Rock Skywalk (青蛙石天空步道)
spots.description: Walk on the transparent glass platform overlooking the Nalou River valley and waterfalls.

spots.name: Nanliao Fishing Port (南寮漁港)
spots.description: Ride a bike along the 17km coastline. Visit the 'Fish Scale Stairway' and the wave-shaped market.

spots.name: Xiangshan Wetlands (香山濕地)
spots.description: Walk on the crab-watching trail to see thousands of fiddler crabs and a stunning sunset.

title: Monastery Above Clouds
subTitle: 雲端上的修道院：五峰觀霧與張學良故居
intro: Visit the foggy forest at 2000m altitude and the historical site where General Zhang Xueliang was under house arrest.

spots.name: Zhang Xueliang Cultural Park (張學良文化園區)
spots.description: Learn about the general's life in seclusion. Soak your feet in the General's Hot Spring nearby.

spots.name: Guanwu National Forest (觀霧國家森林遊樂區)
spots.description: Walk the Yulun Trail to see the Holy Ridge of Xueshan. Look for the endemic Guanwu Salamander.

title: God's Tribe: Smangus
subTitle: 上帝的部落：司馬庫斯巨木群朝聖
intro: Deep into the most remote tribe in Taiwan. Experience the communal living system and stand before the 2500-year-old giant cypress.
transportation: **Private Charter** or **High-Chassis Vehicle**. Strict traffic control.

spots.name: Smangus Tribe (司馬庫斯部落)
spots.description: The last place in Taiwan to receive electricity. Tour the eco-friendly elementary school and church.

spots.name: Giant Tree Trail (巨木群步道)
spots.description: A 4-5 hour hike to see Yaya Qparung, the giant red cypress resembling a mother with open arms.

spots.name: 6 Garden (六號花園)
spots.description: A hidden glasshouse café in the bamboo forest. Perfect for a relaxing lunch on the way back.

title: Hsinchu Grand Tour
subTitle: 竹縣全境巡禮：從湖光山色到科技夜生活
intro: A complete journey covering Hakka villages, scenic lakes, and the modern nightlife of Hsinchu City.

spots.name: Emei Lake (峨眉湖)
spots.description: Walk the suspension bridge and admire the world's tallest bronze Maitreya Buddha statue.

spots.name: Dong'an Ancient Bridge (東安古橋)
spots.description: A 5-arch stone bridge built in 1933. A scenic spot famous for the movie 'Our Times'.

spots.name: Hsinchu Bar Hopping (新竹酒吧巡禮)
spots.description: Experience the international vibe of the tech city. Visit speakeasies or British-style pubs.
